archimate:Requirement.name: PE-11(1): Emergency Power | Alternate Power Supply â€” Minimal Operational Capability
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Provide an alternate power supply for the system that is activated [Selection: manually; automatically] and that can maintain minimally required operational capability in the event of an extended loss of the primary power source.

properties.value: Provision of an alternate power supply with minimal operating capability can be satisfied by accessing a secondary commercial power supply or other external power supply.
